1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Ivan, Olga and Valentina, arrive in guests to the children and grandchildren that 9 lived abroad and on an end went to Moscow. Ivan steals money for Valentina and buys a plane-table, but all opens up. Zhenya arrives.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Zhenya is goth, but grandmothers and grand-dad did not know about it. A mother and Zhenya make agreement - a normal kind in an exchange on an evening-party is ready.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Grandmothers and grand-dad go to Zhenya in school. But she instigates a cleaner to pretend to be a class supervisor. Ivan, Olga and Valentina, think that Zhenya drug addict, but it turns out that it not so. It turns out soon, that she is a singer and sings in a gothic group.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The group of Zhenya is invited on Festival of gothic music. When a problem with permissions of parents is decided, the new appears - one of participants of group in clink. But Ivan helps to decide it.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: As punishment Zhenya and twins are ordered to the summer to the grandmothers and grand-dad. Olga hires to Wife of private tutors, but she finds a method from them to get rid. Zhenya and Katya run back on disco.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hard dictatorship of Ivan comes on changing of democracy of Olga. Zhenya is ordered to correctional works in a camp. There and exile twins. Vika and Nikita run back from a camp and Zhenya with Katya pretend to be, that poisoned.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Grandmothers and Grand-dad make an agreement with grandchildren, where the duties of adults and children are prescribed. Grandmothers know about a fellow that brings Zhenya. Adults violate the fourth point of agreement.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Zhenya was offended on grandmothers and grand-dad for the breach of contract. They register oneself in a chat under the invented names, what with her to talk. But soon all opens up and Zhenya plays off them.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Mityai with family returns in Kuchugury. A little admirer appears for Zhenya. She goes to the appointment.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A cutter that Mityai together with Ivan bought was well returned there, where he was purchased. And all leave to examine a house that Larisa and Mityai want to purchase, to settle.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Larisa, saying nothing Mityai, buys a good house in Kuchugury. Berkovich under pretence of verification leaves together Olga in a business trip. A primary objective of this journey is a next attempt to remain in private with Olga. Valya with Zhenya invited on the supper organized in honour acquisition of house.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Ivan and Mityai organized an own removal firm under the name "TT Bu-Bu" and, because all documents on Gazelle are executed on Mityai, they make decision to begin to work. And Zhenya, quarreling with Kyril, begins for spite to him missed each evening with Lesha. At this time Olga and Berkovich enjoy society of each other romantic evenings at candles. On a concert in child's camp of family of Kovalevy and Bugko carry out a touching song.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Ivan a very reasonable idea occurs to in time. He suggests to take up the new type of business. Maxim has an acquaintance in Holland, that trades in colors, and Ivan suggests to put right with him contacts and to take up floral business. And to go to Holland, Ivan with Valya divorce. Zhenya so much quarreled with Kyril. Smart twins prepared bewitching potion, all the drunk was made them and nobody went in a circus.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Daughter Berkovich dislikes the novel of father and she ridicules the relations of falling in love in every way. Berkovich forces a few days to keep indoors from the room, because became ill, and I am one pearl barley. Larisa keeps out in the house of Mityai and that in the disordered feelings leaves to ask on lodging for the night in a house to Olga.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Ivan with Valya return from Holland. In guests to Olga her parents arrive and they not delight from her new escort. Also on a triumph were invited parents of Berkovich, that in the first day of the arrival hardly not quarreled with the parents of Olga. Zhenya reconciled with Kyril during a care from pursuit from local hooligans.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: The birthday of Zhenya came - she is 16 ago. Naturally all united family dedicates all spare time to thinking of different variants that, how to meet and conduct so triumphal tomorrow day. However they forgot to ask, what is wanted by the perpetrator of this crime. And Zhenya prepared a very interesting and unusual surprise to them.
